sentences.en: Any liquid or gas passing it will have streamline flow.
sentences.cn: 任何通过它的液体或气体将呈流线型的流动.

sentences.en: Can you streamline this kind of airship?
sentences.cn: 你能把这种飞艇设计成流线型吗?。

sentences.en: Early experiments in using rulemaking to streamline adjudications were initiated by licensing agencies.
sentences.cn: 利用规则制定来精简审断的早期尝试是由发放许可证的机关开创的.

sentences.en: efforts to streamline the production process
sentences.cn: 简化生产过程的努力

sentences.en: Even when we streamline our test cases to only those that "should pass, " we can fall into this trap.
sentences.cn: 即使当我们将我们的测试用例流线处理为那些只“应该通过”的内容时，我们也可能落入该圈套。

sentences.en: Even when we streamline our test cases to only those that "should pass," we can fall into this trap.
sentences.cn: 即使当我们将我们的测试用例流线处理为那些只“应该通过”的内容时，我们也可能落入该圈套。

sentences.en: He endeavored to streamline the plant organization.
sentences.cn: 他努力使工厂组织简化而更有效地运作.

sentences.en: I wear these trunks because they have a streamline effect in the water.
sentences.cn: 我穿这条游泳裤因为它在水中有流线效果。

sentences.en: In your current job, look for ways to save money, improve service, or streamline processes.
sentences.cn: 在你现有的工作中, 寻找节省资金 、 改善服务或提高效率的方法.

sentences.en: It is believed that the amendments will streamline the legal process.
sentences.cn: 此举被认为将使法律程序更加顺畅.

sentences.en: Modern sculpt of streamline perform the art of kitchen cabinet perfectly.
sentences.cn: 前卫的流线造型,如行云流水般演绎厨房家居艺术.

sentences.en: One example of this is a big sales application in which each geographical region maintains only its own data to streamline performance.
sentences.cn: 大型销售应用程序就是这样的一个例子，其中每个地理区域仅维护本区域的数据以便简化性能。

sentences.en: Some measures need to be taken dead wood and streamline production.
sentences.cn: 应采取“措施”裁汰冗员,以提高生产效率.

sentences.en: Start with a good streamline, toes turned in and ankles slightly separated.
sentences.cn: 开始时保持好身体的流线, 脚尖向内,脚踝向外轻微分开.

sentences.en: The new manager wants to cut out the dead wood and streamline production.
sentences.cn: 新经理想精简机构以提高生产效率.

sentences.en: The streamline shape lid design easy to hold by one hand grip.
sentences.cn: 流线型的设计使掌握更容易.

sentences.en: They're making efforts to streamline their normally cumbersome bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 他们正努力精简本来繁冗复杂的官僚体制。

sentences.en: This section introduces new features that will streamline project creation.
sentences.cn: 这部分将介绍流线型项目创建的新特性。

sentences.en: Uses the streamline form outer edge , the tamper force with mercy.
sentences.cn: 采用流线型外框,刚柔并济.

sentences.en: We must streamline our methods.
sentences.cn: 我们必须简化方法.

sentences.en: We must streamline our production procedures.
sentences.cn: 我们必须精简生产程序以提高效率.

words.tran_cn: 流线型的；改进的；最新型的
使成流线型；使合理化（streamline的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 把…做成流线型；使现代化；组织；使合理化；使简单化
trans.tran_en: to make something such as a business, organization etc work more simply and effectively

trans.tran_cn: 把…做成流线型，使现代化，组织，使简单化
